entries.original: Fixed wrong `@deprecated` comments in `src/agents/index.ts` and `src/hud/elements/agents.ts` that incorrectly pointed to `dependency-expert` (itself deprecated) instead of the canonical `document-specialist`
entries.translated: `src/agents/index.ts`와 `src/hud/elements/agents.ts`에서 잘못된 `@deprecated` 주석을 수정하여, 잘못된 `dependency-expert` 대신 정식 `document-specialist`를 가리키도록 수정

entries.original: Fixed stale `tdd-guide` / `tdd-guide-low` references in `AGENTS.md` (delegation table, agent list, tier table) — replaced with canonical `test-engineer` / `test-engineer-low`

Added deprecation notices to 6 orphaned `agents.codex/` prompt files (`researcher`, `api-reviewer`, `performance-reviewer`, `dependency-expert`, `quality-strategist`, `vision`) to prevent confusion when browsing the directory
entries.translated: 디렉토리 탐색 시 혼란을 방지하기 위해 6개의 고아 `agents.codex/` 프롬프트 파일(`researcher`, `api-reviewer`, `performance-reviewer`, `dependency-expert`, `quality-strategist`, `vision`)에 사용 중단 공지 추가
